description_for_human: This plugin provides itinerary planning capabilities. This plugin should be called when the user requests an itinerary or trip plan, when the latitude/longitude of the user's origin and destinations are known, and when the start and end dates of the trips are known.
description_for_model: This plugin provides itinerary planning capabilities. This plugin should be called when the user requests an itinerary or trip plan. The plugin requires: 1) the latitude/longitude of the user's origin; 2) the latitude/longitude of the user's destination; 3) the start and end dates of the trips; and 4) the number of adults and children travelling. The plugin also takes optional arguments: 1) selected_activity_tags - descriptions things the user wants to do; 2) selected_accommodation_tags - descriptions of accommodation preferences; selected_dining_tags - descriptions of dining preferences; and selected_flight_tags - descriptions of flight preferences
